macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: U.S. major indexes finish week near or at record highs as Santa Claus rally continues
items.summary: The S&P 500, Nasdaq and Dow reached fresh record highs during the week as year-end 'Santa Claus' buying kept momentum intact and volume remained light after the Christmas holiday, with the S&P 500 leading weekly gains around +1.4%.

items.title: SPY posts all-time high as markets enter year-end rally
items.summary: SPY closed the prior week at a fresh all-time high ($690.31) as bullish momentum indicators (RSI/MACD) remained supportive and semiconductor and large-cap tech leadership pushed indexes higher into the holiday period.
items.source: TrendSpider (Market Update Into December 29th: Santa Rally Begins)

items.title: Stocks extend gains after Christmas; S&P and Nasdaq hit new records in early trading
items.summary: Stocks continued to rise when markets reopened after the Christmas break, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq posting new intraday record highs as investors returned to the market and breadth remained concentrated in technology and AI-related names.

items.title: Year-end optimism keeps U.S. markets near record levels despite light trading
items.summary: With trading volumes muted post-Christmas, markets consolidated gains near all-time highs; sector leadership was narrow (tech, semiconductors, materials), while consumer staples and some defensives lagged amid a seasonal calm ahead of 2026.
items.source: MilliChronicle (Wall Street Holds Near Record Highs as Year-End Optimism ...)

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Trust Wallet Extension Exploit Drains $7M in User Funds
items.summary: A faulty browser extension update on December 25 led to a security breach affecting Trust Wallet users on Ethereum, BNB Chain, and Polygon, resulting in approximately $7 million in losses. The mobile app was unaffected, and the company has disabled the update while planning compensation.

items.title: Bitcoin ETFs Record $175M Net Outflows on December 24 Amid Market Volatility
items.summary: U.S. Bitcoin ETFs saw $175 million in net outflows on December 24 despite $34.1 billion in year-to-date inflows, highlighting structural risks as Bitcoin's price dropped from $126,000 to $84,000 in Q4 due to Fed policy shifts and leverage unwinding.

items.title: FSB Warns of Significant Gaps in Global Crypto Regulations
items.summary: The Financial Stability Board highlighted fragmented and insufficient crypto regulations, urging consistent global rules as the market doubles to $4 trillion and stablecoins grow 75% to $290 billion. Implementation gaps could destabilize financial systems amid increasing integration.

items.title: Retail Interest in Crypto Hits Yearly Lows as Bitcoin Drifts Between $80K-$90K
items.summary: Google searches for 'crypto' are near yearly lows amid vanishing retail interest and Bitcoin's sluggish performance, with no Santa rally. Experts predict a 10-year Bitcoin growth cycle driven by ETFs, regulation, stablecoins, and tokenization rather than four-year cycles.

items.title: Major Cryptos Including BTC, ETH, SOL, XRP, and DOGE Rally as Precious Metals Rise
items.summary: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, XRP, and Dogecoin traded higher amid a precious metals rally keeping macro focus, despite L1 tokens underperforming in 2025 overall.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Tier IV Selected by Japan's NEDO to Build Massive Autonomous Driving Dataset
items.summary: Japanese firm Tier IV will lead a government-backed project to create a comprehensive dataset combining real-world driving data with synthetic data from multimodal generative AI models, addressing key challenges in training autonomous vehicle systems.

items.title: Lucidean Raises $18M Seed Funding for AI-Optimized Optical Networking Solutions
items.summary: Stealth startup Lucidean emerged with $18M to develop CohZero™ optical transceivers offering coherent-class performance for high-speed AI data center connectivity, targeting 3.2 Tbps and 6.4 Tbps links.

items.title: Google Israel and Tel Aviv University Launch $1M AI Research Program
items.summary: Google.org is funding a three-year collaboration between Google Israel and TAU to advance artificial intelligence research, building on ongoing partnerships.

items.title: Nexon's Ark Raiders Wins TGA Award Using AI Reinforcement Learning for NPCs
items.summary: Nexon's game Ark Raiders, which won 'Best Multiplayer' at The Game Awards, employs reinforcement learning to create adaptive robot NPCs that learn player patterns and evolve, sparking debates on AI in gaming.

items.title: AI Reskilling Platforms Market Projected to Reach $109B by 2030
items.summary: The market for AI-driven reskilling platforms like Workera and Degreed is expected to grow from $65B in 2025 to $109B by 2030 at 10.8% CAGR, amid workforce transformation trends.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Epic Games Store Offers Mystery Freebie: Pokemon-Like Game on December 27
items.summary: Epic Games Store launched a mystery giveaway on December 27, 2025, featuring a quality Pokemon-like game available for free for the next 24 hours. This is part of 17 more Epic mystery freebies confirmed for 2025.

items.title: Multiple Games Release on Xbox on Christmas Day Including Taxi Chaos 2 Shadow Drop
items.summary: Several games, including the shadow-dropped Taxi Chaos 2 and an all-time classic, released on Xbox on Christmas Day despite the unconventional timing. This comes amid a light release week for December 22-26.

items.title: Hell Let Loose Announces 2026 Roadmap with New Maps and Evolutions
items.summary: Hell Let Loose shared a new roadmap on social media yesterday, planning substantial evolutions in 2026 including multiple new maps following its successful run since 2019.

items.title: Donot Blockchain Game Releases Daily Combo for December 27-28 with Crypto Rewards
items.summary: Donot, a blockchain-based pay-to-earn game launched in December 2024, announced its daily combo for December 27-28, 2025, allowing players to earn up to 1,000 DONOT tokens amid ongoing airdrop events.

items.title: Xbox Game Pass 2025 Poll Highlights Top Additions Like Clair Obscur and Hollow Knight: Silksong
items.summary: Pure Xbox launched a poll on the best Xbox Game Pass additions of 2025, featuring Game of the Year contenders such as Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, Blue Prince, and Hollow Knight: Silksong.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Ford Recalls Over 270,000 Electric and Hybrid Vehicles Due to Parking Function Issue
items.summary: Ford is recalling certain 2022-2026 F-150 Lightning BEV, 2024-2026 Mustang Mach-E, and 2025-2026 Maverick models in the U.S. because of a parking function problem that could cause vehicles to roll away.

items.title: Google Begins Allowing Users to Change Gmail Addresses
items.summary: Google is starting to let users update their long-standing Gmail addresses, offering flexibility for those unhappy with their original email setup.

items.title: D-Wave Quantum Announces Participation in CES 2026 with Live Demos
items.summary: D-Wave will showcase its annealing quantum computers, hybrid solvers, and customer use cases at CES Foundry on January 7-8, 2026, in Las Vegas, including a masterclass on optimization problems.
